Song of the Queen's Protection.name: Song of the Queen's Protection
Song of the Queen's Protection.flavor: You sing a melody of eldritch quality that assaults your foeâ€™s senses while causing wisps of light to blur the outlines of your allies.
Song of the Queen's Protection.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and until the end of your next turn, any ally within 10 squares of you gains concealment until the end of his or her next turn.

Song of Spiral Paths.name: Song of Spiral Paths
Song of Spiral Paths.flavor: This song weaves qualities of the Feywild into the air, causing space to bend around you and your allies.
Song of Spiral Paths.effect: The burst creates a zone of fey magic that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and any ally can teleport 2 squares as a move action.

Song of the High Court.name: Song of the High Court
Song of the High Court.flavor: Bright leaves of radiant power flare around you and your allies as you sing an ode lauding the durability of nature.
Song of the High Court.effect: The burst creates a zone of song that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and any ally gain resist 5 to all damage.
